abstract.t: SenML is one of the data formats used by the Internet-of-Things (IoT) devices to send simple sensor readings and device parameters over the network. However, a lack of a YANG model for SenML means it cannot be used by the applications which already use YANG for data modeling and validation. Furthermore, some of the encoding formats and tools available for YANG models, cannot be used by the devices sending data in SenML format. This document provides one of the ways to model SenML data in YANG. Additionally, SenML data is encoded into CORECONF format using this YANG model to concisely represent the data.
